import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import Signup from"./components/Signup";import Signin from"./components/Signin";import Profile from"./components/Profile";import AddBike from"./components/AddBike";import BikeDetails from"./components/BikeDetails";import ReserveAlert from"./components/ReserveAlert";import PetrolPump from"./components/PetrolPump";import Mileage from"./components/Mileage";import Summary from"./components/Summary";import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const[screen,setScreen]=useState("signin");const[bikes,setBikes]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const savedUser=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));if(savedUser){setUser(savedUser);setScreen("dashboard");}const storedBikes=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("bikes")||"[]");setBikes(storedBikes);},[]);const handleSignup=()=>{setScreen("signin");};const handleSignin=userData=>{setUser(userData);setScreen("dashboard");};const handleLogout=()=>{setUser(null);setScreen("signin");localStorage.removeItem("user");};const handleBikeAdd=()=>{const updatedBikes=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("bikes")||"[]");setBikes(updatedBikes);// refresh UI
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{fontFamily:"sans-serif",padding:"20px"},children:[screen==="signup"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Signup,{onSignup:handleSignup}),screen==="signin"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Signin,{onSignin:handleSignin}),screen==="dashboard"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{textAlign:"right"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogout,children:"\uD83D\uDEAA Log Out"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\uD83C\uDFCD\uFE0F Petrol Expense Monitor Dashboard"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Profile,{user:user}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AddBike,{onAdd:handleBikeAdd}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BikeDetails,{bikes:bikes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ReserveAlert,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PetrolPump,{bikes:bikes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Mileage,{bikes:bikes}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Summary,{bikes:bikes})]}),screen!=="dashboard"&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{textAlign:"center",marginTop:20},children:screen==="signin"?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setScreen("signup"),children:"Sign Up"})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Already have an account?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setScreen("signin"),children:"Sign In"})]})})]});};export default App;
